thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 8 of 186
thread.title: Marycatherine
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Marycatherine

author: Marycatherine
title: Marycatherine
text: I will order all the time from Bake me a Wish if they change carriers from UPS to another. Everytime I order from a company and they use UPS they have mechanical problems, which in this case happened and then UPS took it upon themselves to change the delivery address and the package did not arrive at the guaranteed 10a.m. delivery I paid for! I can tell you this happens EVERYTIME UPS is used.
